name: js-go-presentation
description: JSConfAU 2016 presentation: How to build Pokemon GO in 100% JS
author: Jess Telford <jess+github@jes.st>

scripts.dist: mkdir -p lib && BROWSERIFYSWAP_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production browserify src/index.js --verbose -t babelify -g uglifyify -t browserify-swap --debug -t [envify --NODE_ENV production ] | exorcist lib/out.map > lib/out.js && uglifyjs lib/out.js --screw-ie8 -c -m --in-source-map lib/out.map --source-map lib/index.min.js.map --source-map-url index.min.js.map > lib/index.min.js && rm lib/out*
scripts.test:lint: npm run test:lint:js && npm run test:lint:css
scripts.start: BROWSERIFYSWAP_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development budo src/index.js:index.min.js --dir lib --live --port 8000 --open -- --debug --verbose -t babelify -t browserify-swap -t [envify --NODE_ENV development ]
scripts.version: version-changelog CHANGELOG.md && changelog-verify CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md
